item.title: FinOps 란 무엇인가?
item.description: FinOps 프레임워크 - FinOps is an evolving cloud financial management discipline and cultural practice that enables organizations to get maximum business value by helping engineering, finance, technology and business teams to collaborate on data-driven spending decisions. (Definition Updated: November 2021 by the FinOps Foundation Technical Advisory Council) FinOps는 엔지니어링, 재무, 기술, 비즈니스 팀이...
